text: avar avite vecc muravilikuttum: nannalute raksitave, nannale ni purattayakkaname. (mumpâ€Œ) ceytirunnatil ninn vyatyastamayi nannal salkarm'mam ceytukeallam. (appeal nam parayum:) aleacikkunnavan aleacikkan matram ninnalkk nam ayus's tannille? takkitukaran ninnalute atutt varikayum ceytu. atinal ninnal anubhaviccu kealluka. akramikalkk yatearu sahayiyumilla
